review: Now when someone is looking at their computer and laughing, instead of getting up to gather around the small screen, we cast it on the big screen.  Our family enjoyed this product so much that we bought one for other family members.  They likewise enjoy casting.  Good purchase and used often.We do wish that we could cast everything on our computers onto the tv...i.e. pictures and video from the photo gallery.When we are not using it to cast, we enjoy the beautiful pictures that Chromecast has added.  Nice touch!
author: Diane McSherry

review: It works good! No can do.  It's limited to internet based programs/apps.

review: The setup was simple and the unit has works great right out of the box Since I had an extra HDMI slot on the side of my five year old Bravia I just snapped it in and was raedy to use that input on my menue bar. For the price this unit can't be beat.
author: kevin "Old HP Guy"

review: I've read so much about this product that I had to get one but unfortunately my experience was not a good one.  I own an AppleTV and this does not even come close to it.  I'm sure it may work better with an Android device but if you don't have one it's extremely limited.
author: Gilbert Lopez

review: I have had Chromecast for less than 6 months.  When I first got it, it was fine - it even would cast Amazon Prime video without turning off Silverlight, then suddenly stopped doing that after a week.  It did a fine job of showing YouTube videos for awhile, until one day it stopped being able to show them in full screen but instead only in tabbed browsing, making them way too small on the TV screen to be enjoyable.  That was maybe a month or two into my owning it. I decided to get a subscription to Netflix and use the Chromecast with it a few months ago, and again, at first that was fine. Then finally it quit working altogether - everything is set up same as before, checked and rechecked, booted and rebooted, but the Chromecast didn't even last 6 months.  Every technical support page says to do the same few things that in searching around I find many, many of us have tried and have just ended up out our money - no fix.  I have never had so many disappointments and failures in a product I've purchased before.  So much potential, but it is completely unreliable not just for me but for many users, apparently, and is not compatible with enough products anyway......think twice before buying this!
author: D. Beatty "otowi"

review: I really had high hopes for this item, didn't live up to my expectations.Will wait to see and try a newer version.

review: I could not figure out why it would not download any content. It installed correctly just would not d/l.  It may have been the VPN that we have in use.
author: brian lakatos "Mr. Hitech"

review: I ordered this once it became available. It took a few weeks to get my Chromecast, but the wait was worth it. For 35 dollars this small device is a must have in a any household with an HD TV and Wi-Fi internet. It is very easy to set up. I opened my Chromecast, followed the instructions and within minutes I was streaming on my television. The image quality is superb is you have a good internet connection and good tv. The fact that you can stream from Android phones and tablets, IPads, iPhones, and PC's should be the biggest selling point. I gave these on Christmas and they were a great gift. With the growing list of apps that are becoming available the Chromecast is a must have at any household.
author: DorianCA

review: Works easily right out of the box.  Set it up on my kitchen TV and now I can catch up on my Hulu shows and watch YouTube and Netflix using my iPhone as the controller.
